page.title: 04VISIT TO THE QUEEN'S LIBRARY
page.content: by David,Bradley We looked into Queen Ann's Closet,a tiny room in the library where news of the Battle of Blenheim was given to Queen Ann.As well as books the library has a collection of priceless water-colours by Leonardo da Vinci, Raphael,Canaletto,on show to the public and loaned for exhibitions world-wide ;staff from the library travel with them to ensure their care. A unique collection of papers of the Royal Family is stored in archives in the Round Tower;8-10 staff care for it.The library is well used by Prince Edward studying at Cambridge University and by all the Royal Family for preparing speeches.The Queen takes her after-dinner guests to the library where some famous and important guests read about the lives of their family antecedents.
